Megaton watched from the distance as the polarbear ran lemmingly toward
Megatron, "Poor obedient fool I shall make his demise swift." he thought
hoping that the bear would have had the sense to follow him instead (Since
Kinger ignored my post)

He scanned Pred frequencies logically knowing that it would eventually lead
to a strategic advantage when he heard the coordinates to Drillbits base.
"Perfect yesss?" he smiled knowing that Megatrons replacement would come
soon.

"Do not worry my leader" he called out over his comm."I will return after I
run a recon sweep." His thoughts were logical and absolute, "When I return
it will not be alone." he chuckled at his thoughts as he flew off into the
distance.
----- Original Message -----
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

Sent: Friday, January 26, 2001 5:02 PM
Subject: Re: Destructors return


> OOC: I might be wrong, but I think KitKat eventually told DrillBit about
> it.
>
> ::DrillBit::
>
> "Ok. I'm sending you the quordinates to our new base."
> He did so.
> "We are under a volcano in Greece, so you'll have to find a way under
> ground."
>
>
